mapper.insert: INSERT INTO PAWS ( PAWS_ID, PAWS_F_CODE, PAWS_S_CODE, PAWS_NAME, PAWS_AGE, PAWS_IMG, PAWS_DESC, PAWS_SEX, PAWS_IS_NEUTERED, PAWS_HEALTH, PAWS_THUMB_IMG ) VALUES( (SELECT NVL(MAX(PAWS_ID),0)+1 FROM PAWS), #{paws_f_code}, #{paws_s_code}, #{paws_name}, #{paws_age}, #{paws_img}, #{paws_desc}, #{paws_sex}, #{paws_is_neutered}, #{paws_health}, #{paws_thumb_img} )
mapper.update: UPDATE PAWS SET PAWS_F_CODE=#{paws_f_code}, PAWS_S_CODE=#{paws_s_code}, PAWS_NAME=#{paws_name}, PAWS_AGE=#{paws_age}, PAWS_DESC=#{paws_desc}, PAWS_SEX=#{paws_sex}, PAWS_IS_NEUTERED=#{paws_is_neutered}, PAWS_HEALTH=#{paws_health} WHERE PAWS_ID=#{paws_id}
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM PAWS ORDER BY PAWS_ID DESC
SELECT * FROM PAWS WHERE PAWS_F_CODE ='DOG' ORDER BY PAWS_ID DESC
SELECT * FROM PAWS WHERE PAWS_F_CODE ='CAT' ORDER BY PAWS_ID DESC
